summary: Journalist David Farrier stumbles upon a mysterious tickling competition online. As he delves deeper he comes up against fierce resistance, but that doesn't stop him getting to the bottom of a story stranger than fiction.
cast: David Farrier|Dylan Reeve|David Starr|Kevin Clarke|Adam|T.J. Gretzner|Richard Ivey|Marko Realmonte|Anne James|Alden|Hal Karp|Debbie Scoblionkov|Jordan Schillaci|Lance Roberts|David D'Amato|Romeo Salta|Dorothy J. D'Amato
title: Tickled
